instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
" The conceit is whimsical enough," answers a cold, phleg-
matic friend of physiognomy ; " but, having tired ourselves
with laughing, let us examine what would have been the con-
sequence had this story been fact.
According to our opinion,
the physiognomist would have remarked great differences in a
number of bones, particularly in the skulls, which to the
ignorant, would have appeared perfectly similar ; and having
classed his heads, and shown their immediate gradations, and
the contrast of the two extremes, we may presume, the atten-
tive spectator would have been inclined to pay some respect
to his conjectures on the qualities, and activity of brain,
which each formerly contained.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
" Besides, when we reflect how certain it is that many male-
factors have been possessed of extraordinary abilities and
energy, and how uncertain it is whether many of the saints,
who are honoured with red letter days in the calendar, ever
possessed such qualities, we find the question so intricate, that
we should be inclined to pardon the poor physiognomist, were
he - to refuse an answer, and leave the decision to the great
infallible Judge."

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: admiration, Money bliss, Work opportunities, Creativity
output:
Power, like riches, may be employed to the advantage or
detriment of society ; as the same wealth may be in the pos-
session of a saint or a demon : and, as it is with wealth, or
arbitrary positive power, so is it with natural, innate power.
As in a hundred rich men there are ninety-nine who are no
saints, so will there scarcely be one saint among a hundred
men born with this power.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Heaven above
and Heaven below:
Heaven in constant motion.
With the strength
of the dragon,
the Superior Person
steels himself
for ceaseless activity.

output:
Productive activity.

Sublime success

output:

The dragon remains
beneath the surface.
Do not act.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:

The dragon climbs
to the surface.
Seek advice
from an authority
you respect.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram One/Line Three
The Superior Person
builds by day
and remains vigilant
through the night.
Danger,
but he will persevere.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:

Even a dragon
may fly too high.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Period, Contact with nature, Spirituality (overall), Self reflection, Sociality
output:
Earth above
and Earth below:
The Earth
contains and sustains.
In this situation,
The Superior Person
should not take
the initiative;
he should follow
the initiative of another.
He should seek
receptive allies
in the southwest;
he should break ties
with immovable allies
in the northeast.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: admiration, gratitude, Skin, Well being (overall), Inhibition, Period, PMS
output:
Responsive devotion.
Receptive influence.
Sublime success
if you keep to your course.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: gratitude, amusement, admiration, growth, transformation, Self reflection, Spirituality (overall), New experiences, Public speaking
output:
A fresh Spring
at the foot of the Mountain:
The Superior Person
refines his character
by being thorough
in every activity.
The sage
does not recruit students;
the students seek him.
He asks nothing
but a sincere desire
to learn.
If the student doubts or challenges his authority,
the sage regretfully
cuts his losses.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Four/Line Two
The man is gentle with the misguided
and understands the hearts of women.
Such a one can be trusted
with the kingdom.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Love struggles, Love (overall), Love misunderstandings, Sexual struggles, Fights/discussions, Intimacy, Lutheal Phase
output:

No one respects

at the object of her desire.
Do not idolize.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Overthinking, Self reflection, Intrusive thoughts, Anxiety, Surprises
output:
Hexagram Four/Line Four:
You are so terrified
of being wrong,
you leave no room
for learning what is right.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Overthinking, Fights/discussions, disapproval, annoyance, disgust
output:
The high Heavens
over a yawning
Deep chasm:
an expansive void
where nothing can dwell.
Even though
he sincerely knows
he is right,
the Superior Person
anticipates opposition
and carefully prepares
for any incident.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: disappointment, realization, fear, disgust, grief, disapproval, Digestive system, Stressful situations, Bad news, Feeling unloved
output:
Good fortune
if your conflict
results in compromise.
Misfortune
if your conflict
escalates to confrontation.
Seek advice.
Postpone your crossing
to the far shore.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Six/Line One:
No quarrel will blossom,
unless you let your pride
fertilize this budding conflict.
Let the one who insults you
expose himself for what he is.
Don't fight this battle
until you've already won it.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Six/Line Two:
Knowing
his comrades would be annihilated
against their much stronger foe,
he orders a full retreat,
retires into seclusion,
and is condemned by the very neighbors
he saved from ruin.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Six/Line Three
He stands on his integrity,
no matter what ill winds
may blast him.
Stand or fall,
in the end he will remain
exactly who he is.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Six/Line Four
Realizing the very root of conflict
lies within his own heart,
he lays down his arms
and resolves to accept
the things he cannot change.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Fights/discussions, approval, disapproval, nervousness, remorse
output:
Hexagram Six/Line Five:
Bring the conflict
before a just authority.
If you are truly in the right,

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Six/Line Six:
You can certainly win
this conflict.
Such a victory, though,
will bring a lifetime
of defending your prize
against thieves and challengers

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Deep Water
beneath the Earth's surface:
Untapped resources
are available.
The Superior Person
nourishes and
instructs the people,
building a loyal,
disciplined following.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Good fortune.
No mistakes
if you follow a course
led by experience.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Heaven and Earth embrace,
giving birth to Peace.
The Superior Person
serves as midwife,
presenting the newborn gift
to the people.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Heaven and Earth
move away from each other.
In the ensuing void,
the small invade
where the great
have departed.
There is no
common meeting ground,
so the Superior Person
must fall back
on his inner worth
and decline
the rewards offered
by the inferior invaders.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Heaven reflects
the Flame of clarity:
The Superior Person
analyzes the various levels
and working parts
of the social structure,
and uses them to advantage.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Thirteen/Line One:
Sincere affection in the open.
Why should anything
so deep and genuine
cause embarrassment or shame?

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Thirteen/Line Two:
The clan holds tightly,
armed against outsiders.
This inbreeds fear and cruelty,
which can only give birth
to strife and extinction.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Intrusive thoughts, Love struggles, Well being (overall), Sociality, Blood vessels, confusion
output:
Hexagram Thirteen/Line Three:
You hold with unworthy allies.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
The Fire of clarity
illuminates the Heavens
to those below:
The Superior Person possesses
great inner treasures --
compassion, economy,
and modesty.
These treasures allow
the benevolent will of Heaven
to flow through him outward
to curb evil and further good.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Thunder comes resounding
out of the Earth:
Similar thunder roars up
from the masses
when the Superior Person strikes a chord
in their hearts.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: excitement, love, admiration, Body activity, Creativity
output:
Whip up enthusiasm,
rally your forces,
and move boldly forward.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:

Pride comes before a fall.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixteen/Line Two:
Firm as a rock,
but only when necessary
and appropriate.
This course
brings good fortune.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixteen/Line Six:
Compulsive enthusiasm
can be set right
if it learns from its mistakes.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Physical rest, Good news, Isolation
output:
Thunder beneath
the Lake's surface.
The Superior Person
allows himself
plenty of sheltered rest
and recuperation
while awaiting
a clear sign to follow.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Seventeen/Line One:
An ending opens a new beginning.
Stepping out of your sanctuary
into new company
will bring achievement.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Seventeen/Line Six:
By virtue of your wise heart,
you are followed by a leader.
Come down from your mountain,
and you will be rewarded with another

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
The gentle Wind
roams the Earth:
The Superior Person
expands his sphere of influence
as he expands his awareness.
Deeply devoted
to his pursuit
of clarity and wisdom,
he is unconscious of the inspiring,
positive example
he is setting
for others to emulate.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Rituals, Spirituality (overall), Contact with nature
output:
You have cleansed yourself;

devout offering.

input: Topics: Spirituality (overall), Rituals, Self reflection, Mindfulness
output:

You look at things like a child.

output:

input: Topics: Physical rest, Body activity, Isolation, Sociality
output:
Hexagram Twenty/Line Three:

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
The merciless, searing  judgement of  Lightning
fulfills the warning prophecies
of distant Thunder.
Sage rulers
preserved justice

the laws,
and by delivering
the penalties decreed.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
You have passed this way before
but you are not regressing.
This is progress,
for the cycle now repeats itself,
and this time you are aware
that it truly is a cycle.
The return of old familiars
is welcome.
You can be as sure of this cycle
as you are that seven days
bring the start of a new week.
Use this dormancy phase to plan
which direction you will grow.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Surprises, Money bliss, caring, Work opportunities, Work (overall)
output:
Endure
and good fortune will come.
Nurture others in need,
as if you were feeding yourself.
Take care
not to provide sustenance
for those who feed off others.
Stay as high as possible
on the food chain.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:

You ignore your own succulent dinner
to crave the dish set before another.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics

to good fortune.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:

is admirable.
Good fortune
if you avoid
the slightest misstep

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
A Dead Sea,
its Waters spent eons ago,
more deadly than
the desert surrounding it:
The Superior Person will stake
his life and fortune

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: annoyance, fear, nervousness, Energy, vitality
output:
Triumph belongs
to those who endure.
Trial and tribulation can
hone exceptional character

Action prevails
where words will fail.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Forty-Seven/Line One:
He rests beneath a dead tree,

These lost wanderings
will last three years.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Forty-Seven/Line Three:
Hemmed in by stone,

a trap of his own making.
Struggling home,

Misfortune.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:

Though his nose and feet

output:

When the time is ripe,
you will be

of revolution now,

You transform into a tiger

output:

You dodge the snares

with the lightning speed

The jackals lose their nerve

You have won your revolt.
Don't seek to climb higher.
Instead stabilize the new order
for the good of all

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Fire rises hot and bright

positions himself correctly

Tip over the caldron

input: Topics: Contact with nature, Self reflection
output:

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Thunder mingles with

As the people nervously laugh

the devout presents

Deliverance.

Faultless.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:

Keeping his jaw relaxed,
what words he speaks
carry order and deliberation.
Conflict dissolves.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics

His constant goal

Good fortune

output:

now nothing

output:

at its zenith.
This is success.

output:
Hexagram Fifty-Five/Line One:
He meets his soulmate,
and they couple ceaselessly
for ten days.
No mistake.
This union will change worlds.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Fifty-Five/Line Six:
In his large and splendid house,
no friends or family dwell.
He sees no one
pass through his gate
for three years.
Misfortune

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Fire on the Mountain,
catastrophic to man,
a passing annoyance
to the Mountain:
The Superior Person
waits for wisdom and clarity
before exacting Justice,
then lets no protest sway him.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Find satisfaction in small gains.
To move constantly forward
is good fortune to a Wanderer.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Fifty-Six/Line One:
A traveler with petty complaints
and too many demands
soon wears out his welcome.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: approval, gratitude, amusement, optimism, Travel
output:
Hexagram Fifty-Six/Line Two:
The traveler lodges at an inn
and keeps his belongings
with him at all times.
He gains a loyal servant.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: remorse, imbarassment, nervousness, sadness, Loneliness, Important event, Anxiety
output:
Hexagram Fifty-Six/Line Three:
The traveler causes a fire
that burns down the inn.
He loses the trust
of his servant
and traveling companions.
Danger.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Travel, Stressful situations, grief, disgust, fear, Contact with nature, Isolation
output:
Hexagram Fifty-Six/Line Four:
Taking shelter
in an abandoned cabin,
the traveler finds
his stolen belongings
beside a razor-sharp axe.
What should be delight
freezes to dread.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Fifty-Six/Line Five:
The traveler
kills a pheasant
with his first shot.
For the price of one arrow,
he has bought himself
praise and high office.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Fifty-Six/Line Six:
The traveler
uses a bird's nest
as kindling.
He chuckles at his cleverness,
but soon weeps
when he loses his ox.
Misfortune

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Self determination, New experiences, Healing / curing, Health (overall), approval, gratitude
output:
Wind follows upon wind,
wandering the earth,
penetrating gently
but persistently:
The Superior Person
expands his influence
by reaffirming his decisions
and carrying out his promises.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Exhaustion, Loneliness, fear, remorse, imbarassment, nervousness, Anxiety, Intrusive thoughts
output:
Hexagram Fifty-Seven/Line Six:
The wind dies
beneath the bed.
All courage to persevere
is gone.
Resources are depleted,
defenses are down.
To move ahead
with this course
would prove disastrous

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Sexual struggles, Money struggles, Spirituality (overall), Work struggles, Professional challenge, Love misunderstandings
output:
Hexagram Fifty-Eight/Line Three:
Arguing and negotiating
to win love and joy.
Self-defeat.
Misfortune.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Exhaustion, Digestive system, imbarassment, gratitude, Physical rest
output:
Hexagram Fifty-Eight/Line Four:
This experimentation
with diverse pleasures,
this fruitless chase after
the ultimate thrill,
will damage you.
Joy is tranquil,
not mad rushing,
and will arise from peace.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Mindfulness, growth, transformation, Feeling unloved
output:
Hexagram Fifty-Eight/Line Six:
Don't let thrill-seeking comrades
divert you from true joy

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Rituals, Energy, vitality, Money bliss, Work opportunities, Love bliss, Sexual satisfaction, Body activity
output:
Wind carries the Mists aloft:
Sage rulers dedicated their lives
to serving a Higher Power
and built temples
that still endure.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
The King approaches his temple.
Success if you stay on course.
You may cross to the far shore.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Fifty-Nine/Line One:
He gives aid
with the strength
and stamina of a horse.
Good fortune.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Fifty-Nine/Line Three:
His ego dissolves
and the void is filled
with his Self.
No more
fear and frustration.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: approval, caring, gratitude, amusement, Brain, Good news, Healing / curing, Sociality
output:
Waters difficult to keep
within the Lake's banks:
The Superior Person
examines the nature of virtue
and makes himself a standard
that can be followed.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty/Line Two:
Pacing his own garden
and courtyard,
he refuses to pass out the gate.
Misfortune.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty/Line Three:
He without self-restraint today
forges the shackles
that hobble him tomorrow.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty/Line Four:
He is most content
in frugality and simplicity:
the highest success.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty/Line Five:
He travels easily
with economy and simplicity.
This brings merit.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Overthinking, Anxiety, Intrusive thoughts, Exhaustion, Stressful situations
output:
Hexagram Sixty/Line Six:
Self-discipline
teetering toward
self-destruction.
An empty martyrdom.
Turn back

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
The gentle Wind ripples
the Lake's surface:
The Superior Person
finds common ground
between points of contention,
wearing away rigid perspectives
that would lead to fatal error.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Pigs and fishes.
You may cross to the far shore.
Great fortune
if you stay on course.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty-One/Line Two:
A crane calls from the shade
and her young
answer with love.
My cup of life
is filled to the brim.
Come share it with me.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty-One/Line Three:
True companions
share their fate.
One beats the drum,
one grows silent.
One weeps,
one sings.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty-One/Line Four:
Just before the moon
waxes full,
One horse
breaks from the harness,
and its mate remains.
It is as it should be.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty-One/Line Five:
Finding himself,
his serene inner flame
radiates warmth
that draws others near.
He does not Do;
he just Is.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: grief, Mouth, Stressful situations, Physical rest
output:
Thunder high on the Mountain,
active passivity:
The Superior Person
is unsurpassed in his ability
to remain small.
In a time for humility,
he is supremely modest.
In a time of mourning,
he uplifts with somber reverence.
In a time of want,
he is resourcefully frugal.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
When a bird flies too high,
its song is lost.
Rather than push upward now,
it is best to remain below.
This will bring
surprising good fortune,
if you keep to your course.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty-Two/Line One:
It is perilous
for so small a bird
to fly so high.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: Spirituality (overall), Rituals, Self reflection, Family
output:
Hexagram Sixty-Two/Line Two:
She invokes the spirit
of her ancestor,
but is visited
by her ancestress.
He heads
straight for the Prince
but is intercepted
by the Minister.
It is best.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: nervousness, confusion, Eyes, Bad news
output:
Hexagram Sixty-Two/Line Three:
Focusing so intensely
on your target
has given you tunnel vision.
An ambush could reach you
from three sides.
Heed this warning.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: growth, Mindfulness, Professional challenge, Work struggles, Sexual struggles, Love struggles, Exhaustion
output:
Hexagram Sixty-Two/Line Four:
This prize
you have strived for
could be the end of you.
Wake up to its danger
and you will prevail.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty-Two/Line Five:
Don't take shelter
from storms
that have not yet blown in.
It is too easy to shoot
a bird in a cave.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: disapproval, grief, annoyance, disappointment, fear, Overthinking, Work struggles, Stressful situations
output:
Hexagram Sixty-Two/Line Six:
He flies too high,
beyond his limit.
The plummet to earth
is spent lamenting

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Success in small matters
if you stay on course.
Early good fortune
can end in disorder.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty-Three/Line Two:
The woman has lost her screen.
She will remain exposed
seven days
before it is returned.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty-Three/Line Three:
He marches into
the Devil's Domain,
and conquers it
after three grueling years.
Lesser men
could not do this.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty-Three/Line Four:
The finest clothes
can be shredded to rags.
Keep a sharp eye
on the discontent.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty-Three/Line Five:
The sacrificial festival
launched by
his eastern neighbor
cannot overshadow
the western man's
simple, sincere offering.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty-Three/Line Six:
His head disappears
beneath the waves.
Danger

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Fire ascends
above the Water:
The Superior Person
examines the nature of things
and keeps each
in its proper place.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Too anxious
the young fox
gets his tail wet,
just as he completes
his crossing.
To attain success,
be like the man
and not like the fox.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty-Four/Line One:
Careless so near to shore,
the fox gets his tail wet.
Humiliation.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: optimism, caring, Bad news, Work struggles, Professional challenge
output:
Hexagram Sixty-Four/Line Two:
He brakes his wheels,
but remains on the path.
Good fortune.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty-Four/Line Three:
Though the far shore is in sight,
eagerness invites carelessness.
Cross the river before
stepping out of the boat.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
input: Topics: optimism, gratitude, Stressful situations, Exhaustion, Professional challenge, growth, transformation
output:
Hexagram Sixty-Four/Line Four:
Deep in the Devil's Domain,
there is no room for despair.
Persevere for three years,
and victory will be yours.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty-Four/Line Five:
True to himself to the end,
inner light radiates from him
and warms others in the glow.
Good fortune.

instruction: Write a short divination text based on the list of topics
output:
Hexagram Sixty-Four/Line Six:
Too much wine
at the victory feast
can remove
all cause for celebration.
Be a good winner.
